description: Run completion on the history of the conversation and the user entries. Return the new created entries.

parameters.description: ID of the conversation to which we append entries.
parameters.name: conversation_id

schema.description: ID of the conversation to which we append entries.
schema.title: Conversation Id

completion_args.description: Completion arguments that will be used to generate assistant responses. Can be overridden at each message request.

type.description: An object specifying the format that the model must output. Setting to `{ "type": "json_object" }` enables JSON mode, which guarantees the message the model generates is in JSON. When using JSON mode you MUST also instruct the model to produce JSON yourself with a system or a user message.
type.title: ResponseFormats

completion_args.title: CompletionArgs

anyOf.description: Representation of an input message inside the conversation.
anyOf.title: MessageInputEntry

store.description: Whether to store the results into our servers or not.
store.title: Store

stream.description: Whether to stream back partial progress. Otherwise, the server will hold the request open until the timeout or until completion, with the response containing the full result as JSON.
stream.title: Stream

schema.description: The response after appending new entries to the conversation.
schema.title: ConversationResponse

summary: Append new entries to an existing conversation.
